title: 23.7.3 Release

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

body:
- [x] Confirm anything outstanding for release with other maintainers on #besu-release
- [x] Update main gradle.properties to 23.7.4-SNAPSHOT - https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/5913
- [x] Cherry-pick commits since 23.7.2 onto release-23.7.3 branch - https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/pull/5906
- [ ] Start burn-in of 23.7.3-RC
- [ ] Sign off burn-in monitoring
- [ ] Bump 23.7.3-RC to 23.7.3
- [ ] Docker release startup test:
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:23.7.3`
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:23.7.3-arm64`
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:23.7.3-openjdk-17`
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:23.7.3-openjdk-latest`
    - `docker run --platform linux/amd64 hyperledger/besu:23.7.3-amd64`
    - `docker run hyperledger/besu:latest`
- [ ] Draft release notes
- [ ] Draft documentation release
- [ ] Draft homebrew PR
- [ ] Sign-off with team
- [ ] Publish release (which triggers docker latest tag)
- [ ] Publish Docs Release
- [ ] Merge homebrew PR
- [ ] Social announcements
